item.title: Welcome!!
item.author: Berkay Aktunç
item.description:
Welcome!

Hello! I’m Berkay Aktunç and this is my personal blog. Here I will share articles about software development, technology, programming and personal experiences with you.

About Me

  • Software Developer
  • Technology Enthusiast
  • Always eager to learn

What You’ll Find Here?

  • Articles about programming languages and technologies
  • My project experiences
  • Technology news and comments
  • Personal development notes

You can follow my social media accounts or use my RSS feed to follow my blog.

item.title: Test Post
item.author: Berkay Aktunç
item.description:
Test Post

This is a test post written in English. This demonstrates how the multilingual setup works with file extensions.

Features

  • Written in English
  • Uses .md extension
  • Will be automatically translated when you create .tr.md version

How it works

  1. Create your main post as filename.md
  2. Create translations as filename.tr.md, filename.fr.md, etc.
  3. Hugo automatically handles the language switching
